name: Power Engineering
description: Department of Power Engineering aims at imparting fundamental and applied knowledge in the interdisciplinary areas of power generation, storage, transmission and distribution at undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral levels. It aspires to emerge as a globally recognized department in imparting quality education to produce successful power engineers. Its undergraduate course is NBA-accredited. The department is also a UGC-SAP and DST-FIST supported one. The faculty pool is internationally recognized for their contribution in the field of power and energy. The department also boasts of a network of distinguished alumni spanning across academia and industry.
